FuncDef:
The rtp-header command adds the RTP header to the transparently transmitted TDM frames.
The undo rtp-header command deletes the RTP header from the transparently transmitted TDM frames.
By default, the transparently transmitted TDM frames do not contain the RTP header.
ExtraInfo: This command is used to configure the TDM (Time Division Multiplexing) transparent transmission encapsulation with the RTP header.
